Title: Too Funny to Fail: The Life & Death of The Dana Carvey Show
Writer: Josh Greenbaum, Dana Carvey (additional material by), J.J. Sedelmaier (additional material by), Robert Smigel (additional material by), Bill Chott (additional material by), Stephen Colbert (additional material by)
Actors: Dana Carvey, Robert Smigel, Steve Carell, Stephen Colbert
Plot: Creators, cast and network executives recount the strange history of the Dana Carvey Show, the irreverent prime time sketch comedy show that aired for eight episodes on ABC, following its star's meteoric run on Saturday Night Live.
